details.name: ISO 14289-1:2014 - 7.4 Headings - 7.4.4 Unnumbered headings - H and Hn
details.description: All documents shall be either strongly or weakly structured, but not both.

rule.description: All documents shall be either strongly or weakly structured, but not both.

error.message: Document uses both H and H# tags
